Title: Pu Yi
Publisher: Kaifeng Zhu Xianzhen Fushengchang huashe (开封朱仙镇福盛昌画社)
Notes: Aisin-Gioro "Henry" Puyi (爱新觉罗•溥仪 , Aixinjueluo Pu Yi, 1906-1967), the former and last Qing Emperor of China, with notable persons of the era; these include palace officials, reformers, and early revolutionaries. Below, a map of China during the Qing dynasty.
